CustomField.description: If the calc items you are passing in comprise the entirety of the rollup values you'd like, toggle this to ensure Rollup does not abort before clearing the lookup item's rollup value
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the calc items you are passing in comprise the entirety of the rollup values you'd like, toggle this to ensure Rollup does not abort before clearing the lookup item's rollup value
CustomField.label: Is Full Record Set
